home.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
home.subtitle: Frontend Developer & Designer
home.description: I am Randie Sasongko 👩🏻‍💻, an Informatics student at Multi Data University Palembang with expertise in HTML, CSS, Java, PHP, Laravel, JavaScript, Dart, and Flutter. Experienced 💼 in working on projects with Laravel, React JS, and Flutter, serving as a Teaching Assistant, and completing a Certified Flutter Internship. I enjoy teamwork and continuously learning new technologies.

about.title: About
about.description1: I am Randie Sasongko, a student in the S1 Informatics Study Program at Multi Data University Palembang. I master various programming languages such as HTML 🌐, CSS 🎨, Java ♨️, PHP 🐘, Laravel 🚀, JavaScript ｡🇯‌🇸‌, Dart 🔠, and Flutter 🛠️, and can use frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS.
about.description2: During my studies, I have gained experience in the programming field, such as building projects using Laravel, React JS, and others, including serving as a Teaching Assistant. I also participated in the Kampus Merdeka program, where I successfully completed a 📜 Certified Internship as a Flutter Programmer 📱 (Android). I enjoy working in teams and have the passion to continuously learn and grow in the technology field 🔥.
